landing.featureMembersDesc: Update detailed information, biographies, and photos of each family member quickly and securely.

landing.featureSecurityDesc: Private data such as phone numbers and addresses are strictly permissioned and protected on cloud systems.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.description: **Gia Phả OS** is an open-source platform for managing, storing, and presenting family genealogy. The app is designed for Vietnamese families, with a comprehensive and accurate Vietnamese kinship terminology system.
aboutPage.securityDesc: Since the app is self-hosted, all data stays on your server. Sensitive information (phone, address) is only visible to admins.
aboutPage.contactText: If you have questions or want to contribute, please create an issue on
